AerCap is committed to operating its business responsibly and sustainably
© 2020 AerCap  |Confidential property of the company, not for disclosure or use without permission 4Reporting Period
 This report covers the 2019 financial year from January 1, 2019 to 
December 31, 2019. Certain disclosures in relation to our Board have been updated as per their respective footnotes
Reporting Scope
 Information in this report covers AerCap Holdings N.V. and all of our consolidated subsidiaries (as defined in Exhibit 8.1 in our 20-F), unless specified otherwise
Reporting Process
 We follow the recommended reporting principle of stakeholder inclusiveness, sustainability context, materiality and completeness
Feedback
 We value our stakeholders’ input and welcome feedback on this report or any aspect of our ESG approach
